resources.string: Participate in a simple 5 step quiz and stand a chance to win vouchers!*
There will be a total of 5 questions
Answer all the questions correctly to win the voucher
Give consent for the clicking of my picture for the purposes mentioned hereinabove by Accenture.
Declare that the aforementioned consent has been provided by me freely without any kind of pressure or coercion

Fully understand that the said information will be used in accordance with Accenture’s Data Privacy Policy 90 and Accenture India Supplement to Data Privacy Policy 90 and solely for the purpose set out above.

Understand that Accenture, shall use reasonable measures, taking account of evolving technology and risks, to keep the information so collected secure, and shall hold the information only for as long as necessary to achieve the purpose mentioned in the Agreement.
Understand that such data once collected can only be used for the stated purpose set out here in below.
Understand that this is appropriate and necessary data being collected by VELOCITY for usage by Accenture. This will not be shared for any purposes with any third party.

By sharing my details I agree in my own right to the processing of the information by Accenture for purposes. I understand that such processing will be carried out in accordance with local data privacy laws and Accenture’s Policy 90, which together regulate the way in which Accenture collects and uses personal data and my rights to access and correct my data.
